landing.title: discover AI in the kitchen, one recipe at a time
landing.subtitle: coming soon

product.title: Discover ai.Cook
product.subtitle: Experience the future of cooking with your AI-powered culinary assistant

headers.4: Track Your Ingredients Like a Pro

descriptions.1: We waste food, repeat meals, and struggle to stay healthy - all because we lack smart, personalized and targeted guidance about what to eat.
descriptions.2: That's where ai.Cook comes in. Our AI-powered assistant learns from your preferences, available time, and nutritional goals, and helps you discover perfect recipes.
descriptions.3: Add the ingredients you have to your pantry quickly and easily. You can either pick from a rich ingredient list with nutritional information or add your own.
descriptions.4: Build your personal pantry list with your available ingredients.
descriptions.5: You can classify them by categories, diets, intolerances, and more.
descriptions.7: ai.Cook keeps track of your ingredients, their freshness, and availability, and alerts you when you're running low on something.
descriptions.8: We think privacy and data protection matter, that's why ai.Cook is powered by Apple Intelligence LLMs, which live at the core of your iPhone. No data leaves your device. No ads. No tracking. Works completely offline.

aiAndRecipes.title: The Only Cookbook You'll Ever Need
aiAndRecipes.subtitle: Discover personalized recipes tailored to your pantry and preferences. All displayed in a beautiful, state-of-the-art user interface.

descriptions.1: Enter your available time, preferred difficulty level and any additional preferences, and let ai.Cook handle the rest.
descriptions.2: The combination of our smart algorithms and AI help you by finding through thousands of recipes, the ones that match with you the most.
descriptions.3: In a matter of seconds, you'll get easy-to-follow recipes that match the most with your available ingredients and preferences.
descriptions.4: You can also explore variations, ingredient swaps, and pro culinary tips.
descriptions.5: ai.Cook recipes are one-by-one curated and updated to accomplish the highest taste standards.
descriptions.6: They must make sense for you, your time, skills, preferences and ingredients - while maintaining the excellence of the final result. That's why the recipes themselves are human-created and reviewed. We all love AI, but we love the human touch even more.
descriptions.7: Our recipes are designed to be as beautiful as they are delicious: clear, visual, and effortless to follow. Organize your cookbook effortlessly by categories, diets, and more.
descriptions.8: Save or share your favorite recipes with the ai.Cook community.
